statements: DELETE FROM participant_data WHERE participant_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM survey_data WHERE survey_id = 1 AND participant_id = 100;
DELETE FROM participant_data WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe' AND participant_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM answer_data WHERE respondent_id = 100 AND question_id IN (SELECT question_id FROM question_data WHERE survey_id = 1);
DELETE FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 1 AND respondent_id = 3;
DELETE FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 10 AND question_type = 'multiple_choice';
